scripts.build: for dir in games/*/; do echo "Processing directory: $dir"; (cd $dir && echo "Current dir for tsc: $(pwd)" && if [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then echo "Found tsconfig.json. Attempting to compile..."; npx tsc && echo "tsc command completed for $dir"; else echo "No tsconfig.json found in $(pwd)"; fi) || echo "Error processing directory $dir"; done
